name: Achievement Hunter: Cromulent
description:
The Achievement Hunter: Cromulent is a game about one of the most famous streamers of Eastern Europe, Glad Valakas.
You have to fight zombies, talk to the colonels, make prank calls and much more.
Most of the game consists of Easter eggs dedicated to him and his streams.
Moreover, after completing the game you can get one of the
highest amount of achievements in Steam, 5000!

The game will have a minimum acceptable price,
so if you want to get 5000 achievements,
have a lot of fun alone or with friends at minimum cost possible,
then the Achievement Hunter: Cromulent is the best option for you.

Feature List:
  • The main protagonist is one of the most famous
    Streamers in Eastern Europe
  • 5000 achievements
  • Minimum allowable price
